description: Generates a brief narrative summary of a completed duel including opponent info, wager, result, and streak data suitable for social sharing in the SolFlip Web3 Coin-Flip Duel Arena.

example_response.summary: CryptoKing flipped against SolWhale in a high-stakes 5.0 SOL duel. CryptoKing called Heads and the coin landed Heads, netting a clean 9.5 SOL payout after the 5% platform fee.
example_response.highlight: This win extends CryptoKing's streak to 7 in a row -- the longest active streak on the platform today.
example_response.streak_info: CryptoKing: 7W streak | 23-11 overall (67.6% win rate). SolWhale: streak broken at 4W | 19-14 overall.
example_response.share_text: Just flipped 5 SOL and doubled up on @SolFlip! 7 wins in a row and counting. Who wants next?
